Room.Name: Adlermann Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Adlermann Way, between Al's Woodwork and the City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: Al's Woodwork provides a number of interesting, but otherwise useless wood statues and other carvings to decorate homes and castles. He is supposed to know a lot about the wood, though, and claims wood spirits inhabit all the wood growing inside the city of Oceancrest. All the wood he uses comes from outside the city.
